Detailed Description

Definitions for WRITE multi-buffer.

Function Documentation

static void ctk_wbuf_init ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf,
const char *  buf_name,
void *  buf_addr,
unsigned int  buf_size,
unsigned int  buf_num,
ea_addr_t  out_addr,
unsigned int  out_size 
) [inline, static]

Initializes the given read/write buffer with simplified parameters (buffer size == max transfer size == gap size between each in/out data unit)

Parameters:
[in,out] wbuf - the write buffer
[in] name - the name of the buffer - mainly for debug
[in] buf_addr - the start addr of the local buffer (MUST be aligned)
[in] buf_size - the unit size of each local buffer (MUST be aligned)
[in] buf_num - # of the local buffer unit
[in] out_addr - the start addr of the EA data (MUST be aligned)
[in] out_size - the total size of the EA data

static int ctk_wbuf_request_put_buf ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf,
void **  buf 
) [inline, static]

Returns a next buffer address

Parameters:
[in] wbuf - the write buffer
[out] buf - address to store the put data
Returns:
the size of the returning buffer

static void ctk_wbuf_reset ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf  )  [inline, static]

Resets the internal state of the cyclic buffer

Parameters:
[in,out] wbuf - the cyclic buffer

static void ctk_wbuf_start_put ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf,
ctk_uint32_t  ea_offset,
ctk_uint32_t  size 
) [inline, static]

Starts a DMA put for the given write buffer

Parameters:
[in] wbuf - the write buffer
[in] offset - the dest EA offset addr (starts from out_addr given for ctk_wbuf_init)
[in] size - the transfer size

static void ctk_wbuf_start_put_exact ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf,
ctk_uint32_t  ea_offset,
ctk_uint32_t  size 
) [inline, static]

Starts a DMA put with an exact size (no boundary check; issue this routine only when you can be sure that issuing that size of get won't cause segv fault.)

Parameters:
[in] wbuf - the write buffer
[in] offset - the dest EA offset addr (starts from out_addr given for ctk_wbuf_init)
[in] size - the transfer size

static void ctk_wbuf_wait_all ( ctk_wbuf_t *  wbuf  )  [inline, static]

Waits all the DMA puts which have been issued so far

Parameters:
[in] wbuf - the write buffer
